If you're looking for something thrilling with a historical setting, then 'Flags of Our Fathers' (2000) starring the impressive cast of Stark Sands, David Patrick Kelly, and Jayma Mays, is a great choice. The film vividly portrays the courage and sacrifices of the soldiers involved in the Battle of Iwo Jima.

If you're into psychological thrillers, 'The Secret' (1992) starring Genevieve O'Reilly and Ash Cook will keep you guessing until the very end. The film explores the complexities of trust and deception and raises questions about who is pursuing whom.

For something more humorous, 'Witless Protection' (2008) starring Richard Bull and Richard Bull offers a lighthearted and comedic journey. The film follows a small-town sheriff's relentless pursuit of a damsel in distress, full of twists and turns that will keep you entertained.
